customer_addr:
6669 Lake Worth Rd
Lake Worth Beach, FL 33467

citations.narrative:
On June 11,2025 a search inspection was conducted by APHIS officials. It was determined that the facility currently
brokers and ships regulated birds without a valid USDA license. An application with instructions was sent to the store
owner on October 8,2024. Additionally, the business was previously contacted by USDA personnel on February 27,2025
and informed that a license is required to ship birds. A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of
the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act and Regulations. The facility needs to obtain a USDA license or
discontinue regulated activities.
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALIST n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
On June 11,2025 a search inspection was conducted by APHIS officials. It was determined that the facility currently 
brokers and ships regulated birds without a valid USDA license. An application with instructions was sent to the store 
owner on October 8,2024. Additionally, the business was previously contacted by USDA personnel on February 27,2025 
and informed that a license is required to ship birds. A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of 
the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act and Regulations. The facility needs to obtain a USDA license or 
discontinue regulated activities. 
 
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALIST n
